item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Nevermind… I'm a full member now thanks for that Uzuki :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Hmm… I have a question? How do I become a full member of this website so I can add some info too? A friend of mine told me a forum with many infos about BvS.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
There isn't really a staff. It's pretty much just me as administrator, and whoever else volunteers to add in information. Since I'm not affiliated with AnimeCubed, I can't look up stuff directly. I just have to play the game like everyone else to fill in the blank spots.

There are a couple of really good contributors at this point. We fill in what we can when we can. I think the main things we're missing right now are: The Trade and info on Looping to Season 2.

Maybe I'll try and put together a trade guide today.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: That sounds like a good idea… But some people complaining that the wiki is missing some parts… I can't remember what it was but I hope that you and the staff (if there is any) can make it… I'm still a newbie so I don't know so much about BvS…

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Thanks, it's really appreciated! I'm thinking I might actually buy some ads for the site sometime soon to see if we can't spur up some more interest in BvS :)

item.title: Thank you
item.content:encoded: I'm just a new member but I have used this website for a time now… I was inspired by your Character Page and decided to make my own… And I have done a lot of Advertising for this website as well…

item.title: Good work!
item.content:encoded: This page is coming together nicely, I'm really liking it so far! Keep up the good work!
